content.name: ResultSetToXML
content.text: Converts a java.sql.ResultSet to an XML document

content.p: Takes a com.ten60.netkernel.urii.aspect.IAspectResultSet and converts it to both unparsed XML com.ten60.netkernel.urii.aspect.IAspectString and DOM parsed XML com.ten60.netkernel.xml.representation.IXAspect.

A document is created with root node <results>. Each row of the result set is a first child element <row>. Each column value will be returned as an element with a text value of the result. It is important that the column names returned in the result set are valid XML element names - if they not then you can use the AS keyword in you queries to rename the returned column names.
If there are no results a canonical null <null/> document is returned.
